title: Longest Cyclone on Record Crossed The Entire Southern Indian Ocean in 2023
description: Cyclone Freddy, which crossed the entire southern Indian Ocean before wreaking devastation on southeastern Africa last year, was the longest-lasting tropical cyclone ever recorded at 36 days, the UN confirmed Tuesday.

Zyklon Freddy, der den gesamten südlichen Indischen Ozean durchquerte, bevor er letztes Jahr im Südosten Afrikas verheerende Schäden anrichtete, war mit 36 ​​Tagen der am längsten andauernde tropische Wirbelsturm, der jemals aufgezeichnet wurde, bestätigten die Vereinten Nationen am Dienstag.
en: Longest Cyclone on Record Crossed The Entire Southern Indian Ocean in 2023. Cyclone Freddy, which crossed the entire southern Indian Ocean before wreaking devastation on southeastern Africa last year, was the longest-lasting tropical cyclone ever recorded at 36 days, the UN confirmed Tuesday.
la: Cyclone longissima in Recordum Oceanum Australem Indicum anno 2023. Cyclone Freddy, quae totum Oceanum meridianum Indicum transivit, ante vastationem in Africam australem proximo anno grassabatur, fuit longissima cyclus tropicus umquam ante 36 dies, IR confirmatus die Martis.

Hurricane Beryl tore through Grenada and Saint Vincent and the Grenadines i…

title: What is rapid intensification in hurricanes, and is it happening more often?
description: Some of the effects of climate change include hurricanes producing more rainfall, moving further inland in the Atlantic, and — more concerning to many climate scientists — rapid intensification.
content: Hurricanes are the most powerful forces of nature on our planet. They can produce winds upwards of 275 km/h or stronger, along with intense rainfall and storm surges. And these effects can be felt fo… [+5953 chars]
de: Was ist eine schnelle Intensivierung bei Hurrikanen und kommt sie häufiger vor? Zu den Auswirkungen des Klimawandels gehören Hurrikane, die mehr Niederschläge produzieren, sich weiter ins Landesinnere des Atlantiks bewegen und – was für viele Klimaforscher noch besorgniserregender ist – eine rasche Intensivierung.
en: What is rapid intensification in hurricanes, and is it happening more often?. Some of the effects of climate change include hurricanes producing more rainfall, moving further inland in the Atlantic, and — more concerning to many climate scientists — rapid intensification.
la: Quid est celeritas in turbinum intensio, et fit saepius? Nonnulli ex effectibus mutationis climatis includunt procellas magis pluvias producentes, longius movendo in Atlantico mediterraneo, et — plura de multis phisicis climatis — intensio celeri.

title: Why hurricane-stricken Jamaica can't tap into $150 million of natural-disaster insurance

title: Earth from space: 3 hurricanes form a perfect line before smashing into land
description: A 2017 satellite photo captured three hurricanes — Katia, Irma and Jose — in a near-perfect line across "hurricane alley" in the Atlantic Ocean. Interestingly, the storms, which are named alphabetically, appeared to be in the wrong order.
content:
Where is it? North Atlantic Ocean.
What's in the photo? Hurricanes Katia, Irma and Jose in a near-perfect line.
Which satellite took the photo? Suomi National Polar-orbiting Partnership (Suomi NPP)… [+3706 chars]
de: Die Erde aus dem Weltraum: Drei Hurrikane bilden eine perfekte Linie, bevor sie auf das Land prallen. Ein Satellitenfoto aus dem Jahr 2017 zeigte drei Hurrikane – Katia, Irma und Jose – in einer nahezu perfekten Linie über der „Hurrikangasse“ im Atlantischen Ozean. Interessanterweise schienen die alphabetisch benannten Stürme in der falschen Reihenfolge aufzutreten.
en: Earth from space: 3 hurricanes form a perfect line before smashing into land. A 2017 satellite photo captured three hurricanes — Katia, Irma and Jose — in a near-perfect line across "hurricane alley" in the Atlantic Ocean. Interestingly, the storms, which are named alphabetically, appeared to be in the wrong order.
la: Terra ex spatio: 3 procellae perfectam lineam faciunt antequam in terram conlisit. A 2017 satelles photographicus tres procellas - Katia, Irma et Jose cepit in linea prope perfectam trans "procellae angiportum" in Oceano Atlantico. Interestingly tempestates, quae alphabetice nominantur, in ordine praepostero esse visi sunt.

description: Beryl barreled ashore on Monday striking the central Texas coast. Along with high winds and heavy rain, a major concern is flooding — especially inland.
content: Beryl barreled ashore on Monday striking the central Texas coast. Along with high winds and heavy rain, a major concern is flooding especially inland.

en: Beryl made landfall in Texas as a Category 1 hurricane. Beryl barreled ashore on Monday striking the central Texas coast. Along with high winds and heavy rain, a major concern is flooding — especially inland.

title: Far from the ocean, remnants of storms like Beryl can cause severe floods

Stürme wie Beryl stellen fernab der Küste eine Gefahr dar, selbst in Kanada.
en: Far from the ocean, remnants of storms like Beryl can cause severe floods. Even after storms lose their hurricane status and head far inland, they can still cause dangerous floods. Storms like Beryl pose risks far from the coast, even in Canada.

title: 'We can't wait another year': disaster-hit nations call for climate aid

Last month, amid reports that Hurricane Beryl would become the earliest Category 5 hurricane in history, a group of money managers were busy trying to figure out whether their highly calibrated bets centered on natural catastrophes were about to take …
la: Catastrophe Bondholders Sidestep magnae damna ex tempestatibus actis calamitatibus. Ultimus mensis, inter tradit Turbo Beryllus primogenitus categoriae 5 turbinis in historia fieret, coetus actoribus pecuniae occupatus erat ut instare quaereret utrum sponsiones calibratae in naturalibus calamitatibus versatae essent ... sumpturi essent.

title: Hurricane Beryl Caused $2.5-$4.5B in Estimated Insured Losses, Says Moody’s
description: U.S. insured losses from Hurricane Beryl will likely fall between $2.5 billion to $4.5 billion, according to estimates by Moody’s RMS Event Response. Insured losses associated with the storm include wind, storm surge, and precipitation-induced flooding. Moody…

Schätzungen von Moody’s RMS Event Response zufolge werden die versicherten Schäden in den USA durch Hurrikan Beryl voraussichtlich zwischen 2,5 und 4,5 Milliarden US-Dollar sinken. Insured losses associated with the storm include wind, storm surge, and precipitation-induced flooding. Moody…

Damna salubria cum tempestate coniunguntur includuntur venti, impetus tempestatis, et inundationes praecipitatio inducta. Tristis…

title: One group of investors is set to make a 14% return after the most severe hurricane season in decades
description: According to Twelve Capital, a single hurricane would need to generate losses exceeding $50 billion for cat-bond investors to take a substantial hit.
content: Last month, amid reports that Hurricane Beryl would become the earliest Category 5 hurricane in history, a group of money managers were busy trying to figure out whether their highly calibrated bets … [+4799 chars]
de: Eine Gruppe von Anlegern dürfte nach der schwersten Hurrikansaison seit Jahrzehnten eine Rendite von 14 % erzielen. Laut Twelve Capital müsste ein einzelner Hurrikan Verluste von mehr als 50 Milliarden US-Dollar verursachen, damit Cat-Bond-Investoren einen erheblichen Schaden erleiden könnten.
en: One group of investors is set to make a 14% return after the most severe hurricane season in decades. According to Twelve Capital, a single hurricane would need to generate losses exceeding $50 billion for cat-bond investors to take a substantial hit.
la: Unius obsidum coetus ad quattuordecim annos reditus constituitur post gravissimum tempus tempestatis in decenniis. Secundum Duo Capital, unus turbo generare damna excedentes $50 miliardis pro cat-vinculo obsido ad substantialem ictum accipiendum esset.

title: Brits want to keep spotlight on hurricane-hit Caribbean
description: Britons with links to the Caribbean say they want to keep the aftermath of the storm on people's minds.
content:
Hurricane Beryl destroyed and damaged homes and vital infrastructure in the Caribbean
People living in the Caribbean are still dealing with the aftermath of Hurricane Beryl three weeks ago.
The tro… [+4016 chars]
de: Die Briten wollen weiterhin auf die vom Hurrikan heimgesuchte Karibik aufmerksam machen. Briten mit Verbindungen zur Karibik wollen die Nachwirkungen des Sturms im Gedächtnis behalten.
en: Brits want to keep spotlight on hurricane-hit Caribbean. Britons with links to the Caribbean say they want to keep the aftermath of the storm on people's minds.
la: Brits arcum in procellae-hit Caribbean retinere volunt. Britanni cum Nexus ad Caribbean dicunt se velle servare tempestatem reparata in animis hominum.

title: Why typhoons, hurricanes, cyclones are getting stronger
description:
With ocean warming, we’re seeing stronger tropical storms. Typhoon Gaemi caused fatal destruction in the Philippines and Taiwan, then moved to China. Tropical storm seasons have only been getting worse.

When Typhoon Gaemi passed over Japan, the Philippines, …

Warum Taifune, Hurrikane und Zyklone stärker werden. Mit der Erwärmung der Ozeane erleben wir stärkere tropische Stürme. Taifun Gaemi verursachte verheerende Zerstörungen auf den Philippinen und in Taiwan und zog dann nach China. Die Tropensturmsaison wird immer schlimmer.

Als der Taifun Gaemi über Japan, die Philippinen, … zog.

title: Hurricane Center Tracking Potential Tropical Storm Moving Towards US
description: "A tropical depression could form later this week while the system is in the vicinity of the Greater Antilles or the Bahamas," the NHC said.
content: Only a few weeks after Hurricane Beryl tore through the Caribbean, Mexico and Texas, another tropical storm may be heading in the same direction, and an expert told Newsweek how climate change has af… [+4981 chars]
de: Hurricane Center verfolgt potenziellen Tropensturm, der sich auf die USA zubewegt. „Später in dieser Woche könnte sich ein tropisches Tiefdruckgebiet bilden, während sich das System in der Nähe der Großen Antillen oder der Bahamas befindet“, sagte das NHC.
en: Hurricane Center Tracking Potential Tropical Storm Moving Towards US. "A tropical depression could form later this week while the system is in the vicinity of the Greater Antilles or the Bahamas," the NHC said.
la: Procellae Centrum semita Potentia Tropical Moving Ad US. "Depressione tropica hac septimana serius formare potuit dum systema in vicinia Maioris Antilles seu Bahamas" dixit NHC.

title: Will Florida’s Oranges Survive Another Hurricane Season?
description: A perfect storm of hurricanes, diseases, and water scarcity threatens to wipe out the state's famed citrus industry.
content:
This story was originally published by Grist. Sign up for Grist’s weekly newsletter here.
Oranges are synonymous with Florida. The zesty fruit can be spotted adorning everything from license plates … [+9903 chars]
de: Werden Floridas Oranges eine weitere Hurrikansaison überleben? Ein perfekter Sturm aus Hurrikanen, Krankheiten und Wasserknappheit droht die berühmte Zitrusindustrie des Staates auszulöschen.
en: Will Florida’s Oranges Survive Another Hurricane Season?. A perfect storm of hurricanes, diseases, and water scarcity threatens to wipe out the state's famed citrus industry.
la: Will Florida's Oranges Survive Another Hurricane Season?. Perfecta tempestas turbinum, morborum, et aquarum penuriam minatur ad delendam inclitam citri industriam.

title: Do you rent? You may be more vulnerable to climate-driven disasters
description: The financial cards are stacked against many renters who survive hurricanes, floods, wildfires and other major weather disasters. The long-term effects can be devastating.
content: Venus James loved living in Matlacha, Florida. The tiny island just outside Fort Myers was quirky, with artsy shops, fishing boats and just a few hundred homes. You could walk from one end to the oth… [+12149 chars]
de: Mieten Sie? Sie sind möglicherweise anfälliger für klimabedingte Katastrophen. Viele Mieter, die Hurrikane, Überschwemmungen, Waldbrände und andere große Wetterkatastrophen überleben, sind finanziell schlecht aufgestellt. Die langfristigen Auswirkungen können verheerend sein.
en: Do you rent? You may be more vulnerable to climate-driven disasters. The financial cards are stacked against many renters who survive hurricanes, floods, wildfires and other major weather disasters. The long-term effects can be devastating.
la: Ecquid scissum est? Plures vulnerari potes calamitatibus climatis agitatae. In schedulis nummariis reclinatae sunt contra multos conductores qui turbines, inundationes, incendia incendia et alias calamitates tempestatum maioris momenti supersunt. Diu terminus effectus vastare potest.

title: A potential Atlantic tropical system could reignite hurricane season
description: The eerie calm that settled over the Atlantic Ocean after historic Hurricane Beryl roared across it in early July is about to be shattered.
content:
The eerie calm over the Atlantic basin that settled in after historic Hurricane Beryl is about to be shattered.
Its been more than three weeks since deadly Beryl made its final landfall in Texas. Dr… [+3144 chars]
de: Ein potenzielles atlantisches Tropensystem könnte die Hurrikansaison neu entfachen. Die unheimliche Ruhe, die sich über dem Atlantik einstellte, nachdem der historische Hurrikan Beryl Anfang Juli darüber hinweggefegt war, steht kurz davor, zerstört zu werden.
en: A potential Atlantic tropical system could reignite hurricane season. The eerie calm that settled over the Atlantic Ocean after historic Hurricane Beryl roared across it in early July is about to be shattered.
la: Systema tropica Atlantici potentia potentialis temporis typhonii regnare potuit. Superstitio tranquillitas quae in Oceano Atlantico consedit postquam historica Hurricane Beryllus trans illum in primo Iulio fremuit conlisa est.
